comments.name: Martin Fitzpatrick
comments.comment: I was looking for something similar to this so thankyou for posting the article. It occurred to me that (depending on the control you have over the blog app) you might also want to consider using Django's templating system internally. For example you could create a template tag {% inline_thumnail id %} and then preprocess during save to convert it - copying it in the process to a pre-rendered body_html field in the database. Also has the advantage of saving reprocessing the content during views. Have a look at how django-forum works with markdown ( django-forum/forum/models.py line 223 ).
